# Text Decoration

## Usage

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| `underline`          | ✅ Full Support |
| `line-through`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `no-underline`       | ✅ Full Support |
| `overline`           | 🌐 Web only    |
